extension.summary: AIOStreams addon for Kodi with advanced features
extension.description: Search and stream content from AIOStreams with comprehensive Trakt integration, stream quality filtering, reliability tracking, UI enhancements (color coding, progress bars), content discovery, keyboard shortcuts, and maintenance tools. Features dynamic context menus, smart stream sorting, and preference learning.
extension.news: v2.8.0: Phase 4 - Added background service for automatic Trakt sync (5 min intervals), database migration from JSON cache to SQLite, and database maintenance tools (clear, rebuild, info, vacuum). | v2.7.0: Fixed stream selector visual display, added formatter settings dropdown, and improved cache clearing to include manifest. | v2.6.9: Fixed stream selector display, cache clearing, and settings UI.
